name: CQ.themes.wcm.SiteAdmin
doc: The theme-specific constants for CQ.wcm.SiteAdmin.This class is a singleton and cannot be created...

props.name: GRID_PAGE_SIZE
props.doc: <static> The default page size in the grid (defaults to 15).

props.name: GRID_PAGE_TEXT
props.doc: <static> The default page text in the grid (defaults to "Items {0} - {1} of {2}").

props.name: QUERYBUILDER_WIDTH
props.doc: <static> The width of the query builder panel in pixels (defaults to 240).
